mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, account_id accountId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_count noticeCount, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM notice ORDER BY create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( account_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_count, create_date, update_date ) VALUES( #{accountId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeCount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, account_id accountId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate, FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, update_date = now() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
